PerformanceLongTaskTiming.summary: NOTE Experimental The PerformanceLongTaskTiming interface provides information about tasks that occupy the UI thread for 50 milliseconds or more.

PerformanceLongTaskTimingAttribution.summary: NOTE Experimental The attribution read-only property of the interface returns an array of objects.

PerformanceLongTaskTimingToJSON.summary: NOTE Experimental The toJSON() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("Serialization","serializer")}}; it returns a JSON representation of the object.
PerformanceLongTaskTimingToJSON.returns: A {{jsxref("JSON")}} object that is the serialization of the object.
